sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The life and death of Dorcas VVherein, hee that pleaseth to reade, may finde both good direction for the ordering of his course: and a necessary warning to be prepared for his end. By Samuel Hieron. Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.
[6], 21, [1] p.
Printed by Melch. Bradwood for Samuel Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bullhead, London : 1612.
A funeral sermon. Some print faded. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
